price: Wala hawatayatamani kabisa, kwa sababu ya iliyo kwisha yatanguliza mikono yao. Na Mwenyezi Mungu anawajua walio dhulumu.
arabic: وَلَا يَتَمَنَّوۡنَهُۥٓ أَبَدَۢا بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمُۢ بِٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu anasema: Wala Mayahudi hawatamani mauti milele kwa sababu ya ukafiri na vitendo viovu walio kwisha vitenda. Na Mwenyezi Mungu anawajua vyema walio dhulumu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walā yatamannawnahu abadan bimā qaddamat aydīhim wal-lahu ʿalīmun bil-ẓālimīna
